put

public void put(java.lang.String key,
                java.rmi.Remote endpoint)
Add a remote reference. This will be sent over to the far end. Do not add references that will go away, such as those to a component that is being terminatd.

Parameters:
key - string key
endpoint - endpoint to refer to
